languages.text: "Носи свои шрамы как напоминание и не повторяй прошлых ошибок".
"Wear your scars as a reminder and do not repeat your past mistakes."
languages.original_text: "Носи свои шрамы как напоминание и не повторяй прошлых ошибок".

traits.locale_text: "Wear your scars as a reminder and do not repeat your past mistakes."
"Wear your scars as a reminder and do not repeat your past mistakes."
"Wear your scars as a reminder and do not repeat your past mistakes."
"Wear your scars as a reminder and do not repeat your past mistakes."
"Wear your scars as a reminder and do not repeat your past mistakes."
"Wear your scars as a reminder and do not repeat your past mistakes."

languages.text: “把你的伤疤露出来，时刻提醒自己，不要重蹈覆辙。”
languages.original_text: "Wear your scars as a reminder and do not repeat your past mistakes."

traits.locale_text: “把你的伤疤露出来，时刻提醒自己，不要重蹈覆辙。”

languages.text: 「同じ過ちを犯さないように、傷を体と頭に刻み込むんだな」
languages.original_text: "Wear your scars as a reminder and do not repeat your past mistakes."

traits.locale_text: 「同じ過ちを犯さないように、傷を体と頭に刻み込むんだな」

languages.text: «Que sus cicatrices le sirvan para recordar el pasado y no repetir los mismos errores».
languages.original_text: "Wear your scars as a reminder and do not repeat your past mistakes."

traits.locale_text: «Que sus cicatrices le sirvan para recordar el pasado y no repetir los mismos errores».

languages.text: "Tragt Eure Narben als Erinnerung, und wiederholt die Fehler Eurer Vergangenheit nicht."
languages.original_text: "Wear your scars as a reminder and do not repeat your past mistakes."

traits.locale_text: "Tragt Eure Narben als Erinnerung, und wiederholt die Fehler Eurer Vergangenheit nicht."

languages.text: « Que vos cicatrices vous rappellent de ne pas répéter les erreurs du passé. »
languages.original_text: "Wear your scars as a reminder and do not repeat your past mistakes."

traits.locale_text: « Que vos cicatrices vous rappellent de ne pas répéter les erreurs du passé. »

languages.text: "Yara izlerin senin için birer hatırlatıcı olsun. Geçmiş hatalarını tekrarlama."
languages.original_text: "Wear your scars as a reminder and do not repeat your past mistakes."

traits.locale_text: "Yara izlerin senin için birer hatırlatıcı olsun ve geçmiş hatalarını tekrarlama."
